version_description:
You can share the page you are viewing via Mail or Message

- Share web page via Mail/Message
- Reduced storage use of the app
- Improved operation of toolbar
- Enhanced reliability of JavaScript
- Fixed issue where page doesn't show on some sites
- Enhanced reliability of operations

You can share the page you are viewing via Mail or Message

- Share web page via Mail/Message
- Reduced storage use of the app
- Improved operation of toolbar
- Enhanced reliability of JavaScript
- Fixed issue where page doesn't show on some sites
- Enhanced reliability of operations

Now you can share webpages you are viewing with LINE

- Share webpages you are viewing with LINE
- Supported saving of animated GIFs
- Enhanced reliability of retrieving articles in Site Updates
- Fixed issue where tabs may not open with JavaScript
- Fixed issue where Sleipnir crashes if all items in Manage Passwords page is removed
- Enhanced reliability of adding bookmark entries
- Enhanced reliability of saving passwords on iPad
- Improved behavior of showing bookmarks on iPad
- Fixed issue where SiteUpdates is not added correctly while the first launch on some language environment
- Fixed issue where bookmarks are not registered while the first launch on English environment
- Fixed Russian search engine

Now you can share webpages you are viewing with LINE

- Share webpages you are viewing with LINE
- Supported saving of animated GIFs
- Enhanced reliability of retrieving articles in Site Updates
- Fixed issue where tabs may not open with JavaScript
- Fixed issue where Sleipnir crashes if all items in Manage Passwords page is removed
- Enhanced reliability of adding bookmark entries
- Enhanced reliability of saving passwords on iPad
- Improved behavior of showing bookmarks on iPad
- Fixed issue where SiteUpdates is not added correctly while the first launch on some language environment
- Fixed issue where bookmarks are not registered while the first launch on English environment
- Fixed Russian search engine

Improved toolbar and fullscreen mode.

- Added option not to hide toolbar
- Improved fullscreen (you can switch fullscreen mode by the button in action panel)
- Added feature to exclude specified sites from Site Updates
- Added feature to scroll both rows of Site Updates at once : flick the border between two rows
- Changed design of active tab
- Fixed reload button, adjusted progress bar
- Enhanced Hold And Go: you can open links in new tabs more easily
- Improved stability and reliability of bookmark sync
- Improved reliability of bookmark when you have more than 1000 sites
- Improved reliability when downloading a file
- Improved reliability when reloading
- Changed behavior when you tap App Store link
- Changed to keep tabs as many as possible even if available memory decreases
- Fixed the issue of browsing some websites
- Fixed the issue of search within a page when keyboard is splitted on iPad
- Changed default settings, except Japanese language environment

- Added feature to exclude specified sites from Site Updates
- Added feature to scroll both rows of Site Updates at once : flick the border between two rows

- Fixed reload button, adjusted progress bar
- Enhanced Hold And Go: you can open links in new tabs more easily
- Improved stability and reliability of bookmark sync
- Improved reliability of bookmark when you have more than 1000 sites
- Improved reliability when downloading a file
- Improved reliability when reloading
- Changed behavior when you tap App Store link
- Changed to keep tabs as many as possible even if available memory decreases
- Fixed the issue of browsing some websites
- Fixed the issue of search within a page when keyboard is splitted on iPad
- Changed default settings, except Japanese language environment

Improved toolbar and fullscreen mode.

- Added option not to hide toolbar
- Improved fullscreen (you can switch fullscreen mode by the button in action panel)
- Added feature to exclude specified sites from Site Updates
- Added feature to scroll both rows of Site Updates at once : flick the border between two rows
- Changed design of active tab
- Fixed reload button, adjusted progress bar
- Enhanced Hold And Go: you can open links in new tabs more easily
- Improved stability and reliability of bookmark sync
- Improved reliability of bookmark when you have more than 1000 sites
- Improved reliability when downloading a file
- Improved reliability when reloading
- Changed behavior when you tap App Store link
- Changed to keep tabs as many as possible even if available memory decreases
- Fixed the issue of browsing some websites
- Fixed the issue of search within a page when keyboard is splitted on iPad
- Changed default settings, except Japanese language environment

Improved reliability

- Fixed the issue that Sleipnir froze in seconds on launching

Improved reliability

- Fixed the issue that Sleipnir froze in seconds on launching

Integrated with a curation tool named LDR Pocket.

- Sleipnir Mobile detects RSS feeds and passes the articles to the LDR Pocket.
- Fixed some issues on iOS 9.

Integrated with a curation tool named LDR Pocket.

- Sleipnir Mobile detects RSS feeds and passes the articles to the LDR Pocket.
- Fixed some issues on iOS 9.
Fixed a bug of Ad-blocking feature.
Fixed a bug of Ad-blocking feature.

The following bugs have been fixed.

- Disabled "Open from Other Apps" feature due to iOS 9's limitation
- Some cache files are not deleted on iOS 9
- Auto-Layout is broken in Split View on iPad Pro
- Label appears at upper left of Site Update's article
- Site Update's articles are cut off with iPad Air and iPad mini
- Adjusted Site Update's Swipe behavior
- When Site Update is off and Home is blank, Site Update is displayed in a new tab
- With iPhone 6s and 6s Plus, Site Update's Hold And Go feature doesn't work
- With iPhone 4s, 5 and 5s, Site Update's articles go up and down
- Connectivity of various Web services have been improved
- Black image is created when selecting Save To Cloud
- English release note is displayed when system's language is Japanese
- English help is displayed when system's language is Japanese on iOS 9
- Supports new top level domain names

The following bugs have been fixed.

- Disabled "Open from Other Apps" feature due to iOS 9's limitation
- Some cache files are not deleted on iOS 9
- Auto-Layout is broken in Split View on iPad Pro
- Label appears at upper left of Site Update's article
- Site Update's articles are cut off with iPad Air and iPad mini
- Adjusted Site Update's Swipe behavior
- When Site Update is off and Home is blank, Site Update is displayed in a new tab
- With iPhone 6s and 6s Plus, Site Update's Hold And Go feature doesn't work
- With iPhone 4s, 5 and 5s, Site Update's articles go up and down
- Connectivity of various Web services have been improved
- Black image is created when selecting Save To Cloud
- English release note is displayed when system's language is Japanese
- English help is displayed when system's language is Japanese on iOS 9
- Supports new top level domain names

The following issues have been fixed/improved

- Updated Ad Block Site List
- Connectivity of various Web services have been improved
- Facebook's shared pages are now displayed in Site Updates
- Added a new site "R25" as the Site Updates content
- Site Update's article is displayed immediately after tapping "Start To Show" button

The following issues have been fixed/improved

- Updated Ad Block Site List
- Connectivity of various Web services have been improved
- Facebook's shared pages are now displayed in Site Updates
- Added a new site "R25" as the Site Updates content
- Site Update's article is displayed immediately after tapping "Start To Show" button

The following issues have been fixed/improved.

- Fixed a Site Update's crash that happens under a specific condition
- Improved general behavior on languages other than Japanese
- Adjusted Site Update's articles to be displayed based on a system language
- Fixed an issue where if Site Update's articles are hidden, you can't go to "Usual Site"
- Fixed that all articles in Site Updates can be hidden in Black Edition
- Other minor fixes and enhancements

The following issues have been fixed/improved.

- Fixed a Site Update's crash that happens under a specific condition
- Improved general behavior on languages other than Japanese
- Adjusted Site Update's articles to be displayed based on a system language
- Fixed an issue where if Site Update's articles are hidden, you can't go to "Usual Site"
- Fixed that all articles in Site Updates can be hidden in Black Edition
- Other minor fixes and enhancements

The following issues have been fixed/improved
Also, some new features have been implemented

- Implemented 3D Touch Quick Action menu ー Get quick access to New Tab, Search and Bookmark menus by deeply pressing Sleipnir icon
- Implemented Action Extension "Open/Search with Sleipnir" ー In other app, just tap the Share button. You can open the page or search the word with Sleipnir
- Implemented Touch ID for the Passcode Lock [Black Edition Only] ー You can use your fingerprint to unlock the Sleipnir app
- Implemented QR Code Reader in the Search page ー Scan QR code with Sleipnir, the Web page is automatically opened in a new tab
- Improved "Paste and Open" behavior ー When Clipboard has an URL, the page is opened. If text is there, the text is searched
- Fixed a crash when selecting "Open on Mac" on iOS 9
- Improved "Find on This Page" behavior
- Fixed an issue of articles deleted from Excluded Sites are not displayed again
- Other minor fixes and enhancements

The following issues have been fixed/improved
Also, some new features have been implemented

- Implemented 3D Touch Quick Action menu ー Get quick access to New Tab, Search and Bookmark menus by deeply pressing Sleipnir icon
- Implemented Action Extension "Open/Search with Sleipnir" ー In other app, just tap the Share button. You can open the page or search the word with Sleipnir
- Implemented Touch ID for the Passcode Lock [Black Edition Only] ー You can use your fingerprint to unlock the Sleipnir app
- Implemented QR Code Reader in the Search page ー Scan QR code with Sleipnir, the Web page is automatically opened in a new tab
- Improved "Paste and Open" behavior ー When Clipboard has an URL, the page is opened. If text is there, the text is searched
- Fixed a crash when selecting "Open on Mac" on iOS 9
- Improved "Find on This Page" behavior
- Fixed an issue of articles deleted from Excluded Sites are not displayed again
- Other minor fixes and enhancements

Fixed reported bugs and improved the stability

- Fixed an issue of Share menu background to be transparent on iOS 10
- Fixed an issue of YouTube videos are not played on iOS 10 installed iPads
- Updated ad-block site list
- Other minor fixes and enhancements

Fixed reported bugs and improved the stability

- Fixed an issue of Share menu background to be transparent on iOS 10
- Fixed an issue of YouTube videos are not played on iOS 10 installed iPads
- Updated ad-block site list
- Other minor fixes and enhancements

Fixed reported bugs and improved the stability

- Fixed a crash bug when tapping "Save Image to Camera Roll"
- Removed LDR Pocket (news service) related features
- Other minor fixes and enhancements

Fixed reported bugs and improved the stability

- Fixed a crash bug when tapping "Save Image to Camera Roll"

- Other minor fixes and enhancements

Fixed reported bugs and improved the stability

- iOS 10.3 support
- Added "Scan QR Code" into the 3D Touch Quick Action menu
- Made keyword and URL selected state in the search field when tapped
- Support of 3D Touch for cursor movement in the search field
- Improved QR Code processing
- Disabled Peek and Pop as they didn't behave intentionally in Sleipnir
- Fixed an issue that Pocket's tag info could not be saved (Black Edition only)
- Improved some part of screen design (Black Edition only)
- Other minor fixes and enhancements

Fixed reported bugs and improved the stability

- iOS 10.3 support
- Added "Scan QR Code" into the 3D Touch Quick Action menu
- Made keyword and URL selected state in the search field when tapped
- Support of 3D Touch for cursor movement in the search field
- Improved QR Code processing
- Disabled Peek and Pop as they didn't behave intentionally in Sleipnir
- Fixed an issue that Pocket's tag info could not be saved (Black Edition only)
- Improved some part of screen design (Black Edition only)
- Other minor fixes and enhancements

Fixed reported bugs and improved the stability

- Added LINE app into the Share menu
- Removed "R25" from the Site Updates
- Fixed a crash that is caused by opening App Store URL
- Improved some part of screen design
- Other minor fixes and enhancements

Fixed reported bugs and improved the stability

- Added LINE app into the Share menu
- Removed "R25" from the Site Updates
- Fixed a crash that is caused by opening App Store URL
- Improved some part of screen design
- Other minor fixes and enhancements

Fixed reported bugs and improved the stability

- Restored "Copy Address" button
- Revised Ad-Block list
- Fixed a crash when saving large Web pages to the Cloud storage
- Fixed an issue that Gmail's bottom content can not be shown correctly
- Fixed an issue that image's property doesn't get displayed when doing image search at Yahoo!JAPAN
- Fixed an issue that "Paste and Open" doesn't handle URLs that contain Japanese characters
- Fixed an issue that link doesn't function if a search site is interposed
- Fixed an issue that the hight of Tab Group List becomes Tab Group's hight
- Improved animation effect when showing Tab Group List
- Fixed an issue that the page is broken when tapping "Tab Group List" button while swiping
- Fixed an issue that the call button is displayed twice when tapping phone number link
- Fixed an issue that "(null)" is appended when posting to Twitter
- Other minor fixes and enhancements

Fixed reported bugs and improved the stability

- Fixed an issue that "Paste and Open" doesn't handle URLs that contain Japanese characters
- Fixed an issue that link doesn't function if a search site is interposed

- Improved animation effect when showing Tab Group List

Supports iPhone X.

- iPhone X support
- Changed the minimum OS to iOS 9
- Other minor fixes and enhancements

Supports iPhone X.

- iPhone X support
- Changed the minimum OS to iOS 9
- Other minor fixes and enhancements

Addressed issues that happen with iPhone X and iOS 11.2.

- Fixed an issue that tool bar is broken when iPad is landscape mode on iOS 11.2
- Fixed an issue that display of address bar is a little bit behind after tapping status bar to scroll-up
- Supports Face ID for Pass Code Lock feature with iPhone X (Black Edition only)
- Adjusted display of tab group and tool bar when "Expand screen on scroll" setting is on with iPhone X
- Adjusted display of Search Field on the Site Updates page with iPhone X
- Corrected display position of tab group after displaying tab group list
- Adjusted tap position of tab group indicator which is displayed in the full-screen mode with iPhone X
- Fixed an issue that AirDrop doesn’t appear in the Share menu with iPhone X
- Corrected QR code scanner behavior when camera is disabled
- Updated Ad-block list
- Other minor fixes and enhancements

Addressed issues that happen with iPhone X and iOS 11.2.

- Fixed an issue that tool bar is broken when iPad is landscape mode on iOS 11.2
- Fixed an issue that display of address bar is a little bit behind after tapping status bar to scroll-up
- Supports Face ID for Pass Code Lock feature with iPhone X (Black Edition only)
- Adjusted display of tab group and tool bar when "Expand screen on scroll" setting is on with iPhone X
- Adjusted display of Search Field on the Site Updates page with iPhone X
- Corrected display position of tab group after displaying tab group list
- Adjusted tap position of tab group indicator which is displayed in the full-screen mode with iPhone X
- Fixed an issue that AirDrop doesn’t appear in the Share menu with iPhone X
- Corrected QR code scanner behavior when camera is disabled
- Updated Ad-block list
- Other minor fixes and enhancements

Fixed reported issues and increased the stability.

- Implemented haptic feedback when using for gestures or tab switch
- Fixed an issue that history list doesn’t come up when tapping “back” or “forward” button
- Fixed an issue that Google accounts can not be switched
- Increased the maximum number of auto-sync bookmark up to 2,000
- Fixed an issue that “Share” menu doesn’t get displayed when viewing PDF file
- Changed menu content when holding a phone number link
- Improved Toolbar animation when scrolling
- Fixed an issue that hidden toolbar buttons can be tapped with iPhone X
- Corrected address bar and tab group positions on launching with iPhone X
- Updated Ad-block list
- Other minor fixes and enhancements

Today Widget Support : you can start searching with Sleipnir immediately from home screen or locked screen.

- Fixed an issue that unintentional scroll happens when inputting an external keyboard
- Fixed an issue that tab group is not hidden in fullscreen mode with iPad Pro
- Improved reliability of passcode lock
- Updated Ad-block list
- Other minor fixes and enhancements
